section.title: Collecting and Downloading Logs from All Servers in a Zone

procedure.title: To Collect and Download Logs from all Servers in a Zone

step.para: Click on the Diagnostics accordion, then click the Zone that you want to view.

Click
(Collect logs). All files in the logs directory as well as configuration files are collected.
Click OK. The status of the log retrieval shows in the CloudForms Management Engine console.
